Pro installers that do this for a living probably use more than 1.LOVE IT.

Background you can skipI bought this set for myself and my kids so that we could play in the yard. I had seen the Carlton set for about 35$ in a store and did not like the quality of the rackets and the wobbly poles so I decided to buyt the slightly more expensive Salaun set, for 15 to 20 bucks more.About this setIt did not disappoint. The set came, like most other sets, in a plastic carrying bag and was complete:- 6 rackets of which 4 regular size and 2 short, in 4 distinct colors and made of aluminium- Net (poly)- Poles (steel)- Pole fasteners (to pull the net tight)with ground spikes- 3 nylon shuttles in a container- carrying bagThe rackets are very decent quality, certainly one grade up from the 7$ steel throw-away stuff. These are actually nice looking, very lightweight (aluminum) and durable. The string is tight and, again, these are worth the extra money over the Carlton set I looked at.The net was relatively easy to set up and I liked the fact it was set with steel poles. Doesn't mean it won't break if you manhandle it but certainly more durable than pvc.By the way, I posted a bunch of pics so you can look at the parts.Pros- Decent quality that will make this set last- Complete with 6 rackets and everything else you needCons- Little tricky to get the net right. Best thing would be a permanent net with poles set in concrete. These poles are always a little tricky with the tension cords but once set up they should stand up through the summer if you wanted to.Setting it up a few times will make it easier though. Minus one star for that but all sets will have that flaw.Final thoughtsHe/She who finds a simpler solution to the netting gets 5 stars. Consider buying a separate net solution if you are looking for something more permanent but if that is the case I recommend spending the 200$ or so for a semi-pro setup anyways. For your run of the mill home use this is perfect. With so many rackets it is a good party set.If you have the room in your yard or lots of wind interference consider buying a simplet Speedminton set. Tougher, faster game and loads of fund. Goes for 30$.

Many (or only a few) years from now people will figure out that there is nothing healthy about eating stir fried food out of a non-stick coated Wok. How can it be? Non-Stick was not made for high heat and it is not good for using lots of utensils in.I tried them all, Stainless (horrible), aluminum (not so bad!), non-stick (cancerous), Cast Iron (wonderful) and Carbon (wonderful). The trick really is in the seasoning. If you have that down and you treat it the way it should be treated (I.e. no soap, no standing liquids, heat dry, rub in oil after use) then this wok will become your cheapest as well as favorite kitchen tool. Almost non-stick without chemicals!The have several sizes from the Wok Shop (THE BEST!!!) and this one has not disappointed. My most used size. I have mostly single handle (wood) but this larger size is best with the double hancle. I like the all steel as I sometimes reseason under the broiler and that is not so good with wood handles lest you cover them up.Pros:- Great size- Durable- Natural non-stickCons:- You need to get familiar with how to season and properly maintain (not alot of work, just a good Google search or read the Wok SHop instructions.

Thumb drives were all the rage several years ago, but it seemed as though technology nearly passed them by.  512mb, 2gb, and 4gb sticks seemed nearly irrelevant in the ever increasing world of large media files and rich documents.  Furthermore, early on, the prices for the minimal amount of storage was high. Sure, it worked well at replacing a Writable CD for temporary a files, but storage capacity and speed held the product back from offering much else.However, with some time, the flash drives began to catch up in cost and technology thereby ushering in brand new use cases for the tech. These Samsung drives are fast.  Indeed, if your computer supports USB 3.0 and your machine has an old fashioned spinning hard drive, this thumb drive will actually be faster than your internal drive.  Whatever the case, you will find that you can store, backup, and transfer much faster with a usb 3.0 drive.Samsung has also added some slick, shiny style to the product which is well appreciated.  I most like the value of the 64gb and 128gb capacities. Cloud storage and other internet transfer services may make a physical storage medium feel outdated, in many ways it is.  Still, there are use cases for these especially as they are now so fast and offer such high capacity levels.  Overall, recommended.  This is not the flash drive of ten years ago.  Nice job Samsung!

If you are a fan and or owner of Apple products, there is one thing certain.  At least once a day the time will come to charge your device or devices, which means you need a lightning cable.  While many complained about the move to the lightning cable in Fall 2012, the reversibility of the connector and size has proved successful.I simply can never have enough lightning cables and Belkin has a great offering here.  This company has a long history of making Mac and other Apple accessories, so they always deliver a quality job.  The ends of the cable, cable itself, etc. are all of acceptable and durable quality.In particular, I have been using the ten foot option.  While this seemed quite large and surprised me when I opened the box, Belkin offers this size in case your USB port or outlet are that bit further from your desk or night table.  Passengers in the rear of a vehicle without an outlet in the second row might also benefit from the extended length.Overall, Belkin is a brand that can be trusted to deliver a quality third party accessory for your Apple device.  Now on top of that, they are offering varying lengths of cables, to fit the exact situation you need to meet.  I'm always in favor of pricing coming down for a relatively simple cable, but I recommend this cable if you need another lightning to USB solution!

The Lenox Pierced Lit Penguin Ornament is a quality, affordable holiday keepsake.In today's world, it seems the things that make an impact on people are becoming more and more expensive.  Ornaments that cost triple digits and are not actually hung on a tree seems to be a popular pastime for those diehard holiday collecting types with the bank notes to support it.However, sometimes you find a little gem that is for the rest of us, affordable, but makes an impact on us and brings that childhood like smile to our faces.This Lenox ornament is to that level of quality collectible.  The piercing in the china, the stars, are of beautiful dimension and quality.  You want to reach out and touch the stars.  The face and scarf have subtle yet expressive detail.  It put a great smile on my face as well as the children who saw it when I opened it.  Indeed, it has gotten me in the spirit to make sure we begin our decorating, on time, in the coming weeks.Even the tassel is of good quality, and the battery lighting feature was a surprise delight.  It adds very little weight too.  The ornament is not one of those that are so heavy you will never find a branch, considering the lighting feature is included, the weight is just right.Overall, Lenox creates rememberable and quality products, in an affordable category.  This Pierced Lit Penguin Ornament I hope will be in our family's traditions for decades to come.  Recommended.

There are many choices when it comes to beard and hair trimmers.  Panasonic is quickly becoming a popular choice with their latest offerings.The ER-GB60-K will not disappointment with many fantastic features.  Firstly, there are two attachments, one for beard and one for the hair on your head.  Snap the comb on, and then further select the "just right," length by rotating the manual selection on the front of the unit.  It works well and feels of quality.The built in battery is of the latest technology.  A relatively short charge, just over a hour, gives you a full battery of trimming with fifty minutes (or more based on my use) before needing to be charged once again.One drawback is the small storage pouch included with the unit.  It only fits the trimmer itself.  The charging cable, comb attachments, and cleaning brush do not fit.  And why is the cleaning brushes always so easy to lose and/or drop?  I did not even have the trimmer out of the package, and I dropped the cleaning brush. Be careful! ha. Oh, you also need to store the small bottle of mineral oil included to lubricate the trimmer. So many little things to store! You can also rinse the end of the trimmer with water, though to really cling out the gunk, I would always want to use the small brush too.Both attachments for beard and hair work as you would expect.  Nevertheless, for serious, thick hair trimming I would always choose a unit with full AC wall power.  These cordless units do not have power for thick hair, though short hair as shown in the images here on Amazon should work well.Overall this is quality unit and surely you will have a trimming need that it will satisfy.  Thanks Panasonic.  I'd recommend this trimmer should you be in the search for one and the features meet your demands.

It is absolutely true!  It seems our lives are tied more and more to our chargers!  We have to charge just about everything these days, toothbrushes, shavers, remote controls, computers, tablets, and of course, the cannot live without smart phone.The Belkin BSV300ttCW 3-outlet wall mount candle is a great solution to plug in at least some of those electronic devices.  Our family is sharing this to take care of our iPhones.  The two USB ports are terrific, and it is a fast charge versus a USB connected to your computer.  Furthermore, we have used the traditional outlets below the USB ports to charge portable bluetooth speakers, worked great.Overall, the Belkin 3-outlet wall mount cradle is great in that it takes one of your wall outlets and turns it into a 3-outlet with the bonus of two USB ports ready to go.  What's not to love about that?  Well, only one thing.  When inserted in the wall, the device doesn't leave you with the greatest sense of security.  It is fairly large to be supported by the one outlet in the back.  Therefore, we certainly do not use the cradle groove on top of the device for storing our phone.  We simply plug in the USB and sit the phone on the counter below the Belkin device, no worries.We have also used it to charge an iPad, and that works great too.Overall, Belkin tries to deliver quality in its aftermarket accessories.  The appearance and style is of top marks too and will maintain the elegance of your latest gadgets with its modern look.  For the most part, they hit that high quality mark once again. Recommended if you are short on charging space and/or outlets.

Vornado is quickly becoming a recognized brand in small home cooling and heating.  Just step into your local discount department store or corner drugstore!  You will likely find Vorando products on the shelf.This latest offering, the Tornado VH202 Personal Space Heater in Black delivers an extremely compact unit that offers both personal space heating ability, but also a fan function for those warmer months.I love the size as I can choose to place it either on my desk or underneath it, to keep the feet nice and warm.  Depending on your workplace policy, the unit is small enough that many will choose to take it to work to brave those cold months, or provide some air movement via the fan function in the summer.  The heat put out by the unit in heating mode is impressive, and the fan helps move that warm air throughout your personal space.One caveat for me with any personal space heater that includes a fan is listening to that very fan.  It creates a white noise that some may find comforting, but I find distracting.  I end up feeling as though I cannot hear the rest of my surroundings comfortably when the unit is running.Overall, the Vorando VH202 performs its duty well.  It is compact which makes its placement nearly limitless.  Nevertheless, the fan that helps move the air through your space bothers me after some time.  I actually prefer to work across the room from the unit.  While it doesn't directly reach me at that distance, I enjoy going over to it for some breaks and quick recovery from the chill.  Recommended product, especially if you don't mind the sound of the fan.

AHAVA Essential Day Moisturizer is a luxury moisturizer and the company puts an emphasis on their commitment against animal testing as well as leaving a positive impact on the environment.  AHAVA commitment to using natural, many plant-based or naturally deposited mineral ingredients gives you an impression that they are Israel's version of Aveda.  Nevertheless, AHAVA's stance on animal testing and use of non-animal ingredients is even more reassuring than Aveda, because AHAVA clearly puts no animal testing right on its packaging, whereas Aveda has removed such language due to their parent, Estee Lauder.  In terms of quality, AHAVA products are of that luxury tier of skin care just as much as Aveda.When it comes to the product itself, we loved AHAVA Time to Hydrate Essential Day Moisturizer.  The moisturizer is rich, but not greasy.  It truly hydrates the skin, but does so in a beautifully, healthy, tactful process, without leaving the skin greasy or uncomfortable.  The product's moisture appears to last hours rather than a hour.What's great too is that AHAVA has many other products, from eye creams, SPF creams, night creams, masks, and the list goes on.  It's terrific that there is a skin care company that is free of animal testing and free of animal-derived ingredients and yet delivers in each product category.  That is how it should be!  Plus, the bonus that many of the products come all the way from Israel, that is a cool factor as well.  Thanks AHAVA, your products are high quality, and your animal policy is appreciated.  Recommended product and line!

Reynolds Cookie Baking Sheets Non-Stick Parchment Paper, 22 Count aims to bring the baking secret to the masses.  Truly, ever wonder why your cookies or other baked goods never come out quite right?  You're pre-heating, following your recipe to the letter, and it's still not quite right?  Parchment paper may be the final secret you're missing.  Reynolds Cookie Baking Sheets aim to make using parchment paper for baking easier as you are provided 22 pre-cut sheets to simply unfold and lay on your baking sheet.  They work as well as any parchment paper and they are fairly convenient.The one negative is the quantity compared to a roll of parchment.  The best deal is at Costco and Sam's Club who have their store brand, yet genuine French made parchment paper, that comes in simply gigantic rolls for not much more than one of these small boxes of pre-cut sheets.  The pre-cut sheets are cool, but they are not worth the extra expense.Our family uses parchment paper for everything.  Essentially, there is not one item that goes into our oven that doesn't have parchment paper below it.  Not only does it prevent burning, but it keeps your pans clean!  Whether you're baking a cake (cut out a circle for your cake pans), heating some left overs, etc. parchment paper is how we begin any baking session.  Parchment recommended!  These pre-cut sheets?  Not so sure.

The Five Star Expanding File, 6 Pocket in Blue tone finish is an economical and compact expanding file.  The durable plastic shell gives you more confidence in using the product than if the construction was all paper.  The enclosure is a simple, but rather elegant elastic rope.  The file includes two notches to nightly store your pens.I have enjoyed using this expanding file.  I would like to point out to any potential buyers that the file's thickness is on the compact size.  Therefore, even as it expands, it's capacity is fairly limited.  Of course, this is great for space saving, as this file takes up a minimum footprint.  However, don't expect to store hundreds of documents.Overall, Five Star has provided a durable file with a secure closure and convenient features such as pen storages. There is a recommended product, but again, please keep in mine its capacity limitations.

WeMo F5Z0598 Osram Lightify Gardenspot Mini RGP Starter Set is one of the most impressive outdoor landscaping items I have come across.The product is of a high build quality.  The wiring and end caps that seal off the extension are solid and truly built for outdoor weather.  You get a sense from holding and installing the product that it will be a part of your outdoor landscaping for many years to come.Second, setup of Wi-Fi controlled devices doesn't always go smoothly.  However, the included WeMo and Osram Lightify Gardenspot were up and running in minutes!  It just works!  Furthermore, I quickly picked my favorite custom color for the lights and assigned them to light at sunrise and sunset each day.  How cool is that?  No matter the season, the lights will always come on at exactly the right time.  Brilliant.The light output is significant for LEDs.  Indeed, there is an included brightness control in the WeMo app and some may want to take advantage of that.  These shine brightly.  I have lined one of my garden areas, and I am already searching my property for the next best place to install another set.  Of course, I am somewhat constrained by where I can get power to plug them in, but I can see adding more Lightly Gardenspot sets in the future.Overall, I was thoroughly impressed by this kit combining the easy of use of WeMo features and Osram Lightly Gardenspot quality.  I am going to look for more products to run through the WeMo in the future including more from Osram!  Recommended set!

Design Imports India Machine Washable Cleaning, Drying, and Utility Bar Mop Dishtowel set hit a home run in our home.  We simply never had enough towels in our kitchen.  Yes, it seems you dry one large pot, and you already need a second towel.  Now, we have them!DII's dishtowel is a quality product, great in the kitchen, and the "natural," color choice looks great in our home.  We keep our kitchen and dusting towels separate, so I cannot comment on using them to dust, I tend to use something a bit softer, like microfiber for dusting  However, in the kitchen these are ideal and where we intend to keep using them.  Grab some disinfectant from Seventh Generation, a clean towel, get those counters clean, it's great and better than using paper products all the time.  Still, for anything that can grow bacteria, paper products have a place, and we do not use a towel that is dirty over and over.I have used these to clean the espresso machine, and they worked great there too.  However, the focus here is liquid absorption.  Therefore, I most recommend them for drying.  Great for your wine glasses too.  Using a clean, new towel for your freshly washed wine glass always feels great.  I recommend them.  Great towels in the kitchen.

One thing was clear in our household.  We had a large supply of the previous Apple dock connector cables, used from the third generation iPod until the iPhone 5 changed to lightning, approximately ten years.  Therefore, when we first started to get lightning connector devices, we did not have the "easy to find," and "easy to grab," cables lying around as we did the previous generation connector.Therefore, it's great that third parties offer quality, nice looking lightning cables in many different lengths.  I have been impressed by this cable.  Indeed, one of our first genuine Apple cables began to show its age, so I actually switched to this Belkin one as the primary unit for my phone.  It just works, and it works great.  Belkin always delivers high quality aftermarket products that rival OEM Apple in terms of quality.  They have a lot of experience and expertise in making "Made for..." products so you know they will perform well and Apple certifies them.It's great to grab a shorter one like this, if you want to reduce clutter on your desk, or inside your vehicle.  After all, it's best to have a cable anywhere and everywhere.My only gripe is a small one.  Yes, the cable looks great, blends with Apple products, has a nice feel, and performs flawlessly.  However, for an aftermarket cable, I find the price just a tad steep.  Still, if you need a lightning cable or two, I recommend this one.  Thanks Belkin!

Portable, compact hard drives have been a popular market for several years now.  The reason being that no matter how much storage your computer came with from the factory, including notebooks that often have smaller hard drive or SSD drives, a portable hard drive allows you massive storage with a simple USB cable.USB 3 has made it that much better.  If your PC or Mac is equipped with USB 3, the speeds at which the transfers occur is nearly as fast as an internally mounted hard drive.  Furthermore, this particular drive is also targeted towards Xbox One users who want to quickly plug in additional storage.Overall, the drive is impressive.  2 TB of storage is fantastic.  I am using it as a Time Machine backup for one of my Macs, and it will be several months before my machine begins the need to delete any of the backups as this is a lot of storage.  Terrific.  Yes, of course, the drive isn't specifically targeted at Macs, but I simply formatted it in Disk Utility, and it works flawlessly.Many suggest the drive is designed for "gaming," but in truth it's marketed towards gaming.  It will be great as an external USB 3 drive whether with your PC, Mac, or Xbox One.  Recommended Product.

Amazon Echo was introduced to many of us with an informative email from Amazon.  It sounded interesting.  A speaker that you talk to, and that talks back to you.  However, how would it work?The excitement as I waited the weeks until the delivery was quite high, but even I was surprised just how useful Amazon Echo would be.  On first impressions, Echo was smaller than I expected, which allowed it to be placed in a small nook in a useful spot between kitchen and living room.  It looks great and the light ring is slick.  Tricky math calculations, weather around the world, wikipedia searches, and the list goes on.  Our family regularly uses Echo for these situations.  Furthermore, the most used feature is music.  Prime music has such a great library as well as all your Amazon purchased music being a quick voice request away is fantastic. So often, pulling out your phone to send music to a speaker, or finding just the right radio channel can be more tiresome than you think.  Our family, if we have to go through those extra steps, will simply go without music.However, if we need some gentle background tunes, Amazon Echo gets it playing it mere seconds, with minimum effort.  The sound quality is acceptable.  Some music obviously sounds better than others, but it is all acceptable, and enjoyable.  And if you do want to take the time to get your phone out, Amazon Echo works as a great bluetooth speaker too.Echo's voice detection is superb.  It never misses the "Alexa," keyword and is ready to go instantly. Furthermore, it picks up your requests quite well.  However, if you're listening to music on a high level, it might be difficult for Echo to hear you.Overall, during the past several months, Echo has earned a permanent spot in our home.  It has a great design, reliably adds a usefulness to our daily lives, and is a lot of fun too.  Amazon did a superb job with Echo, and we are anxious to see other Echo products in the future!  Highly recommended product!

Alba Botanica has several beautifully engineered products.  Terrific shampoo and conditioner, solid moisturizers, and a nice face cleanser.  They have many SPF sunscreen products as well.This product, for a sunscreen, has an acceptable smell.  It is less off-putting than many sunscreens.  It feels ok on the skin for being such a high SPF, and it seems to work very well.  I believe as a spray-on sunscreen, the product would work well for most people.Nevertheless, one of the major aspects that I found attractive of Alba Botanica was the fact they have 100% Vegetarian Ingredients and not tested on animals.  This is probably true for the Alba Botanica labeled products.However, Alba Botanica is only a brand of the Hain Celestial Group.  Alba Botanica does not seem to be its own company, just a brand of Hain Celestial.  The problem is Hain Celestial also owns turkey and chicken meat brands.I have a problem spending money on "vegetarian" products when the same headquarters are profiting from animal slaughter.  Furthermore, while I cannot vouch for the authenticity, I read an online blog of a partnership Hain has in Asia, and that company may or may not test on animals, it was not clear.  In other words, Hain is a very large company and much more than a vegetarian personal care products company.Overall, Alba Botanica has some beautifully engineered products.  However, it's simply a line or brand from Hain Celestial which makes my stomach uneasy. Our family plans to use up the Alba Botanica products remaining in our home, and then move elsewhere. Kiss My Face might be one option.  A second option is 100% Pure brand.  Both have very capable products.  Perhaps, someday, Alba Botanica could be spun off into its own company or purchased by someone else.

The Metrokane Rabbit Valvet Champagne Opener Set is yet another quality product from the wine accessory brand.  Champagne and/or sparkling wine is great for celebrating special occasions.  Surely, the perfect bottle of champagne is not too difficult to open by hand, but what about that stubborn bottle and what about looking a bit more elegant at that dinner party next week?  Enter the Metrokane Champagne Opener Set.The pliers are beautifully constructed to perfection and give you just the right grip to pull the cork with ease.  I cannot get over the quality of the pliers.  The cost of this item truly lies in the pliers as you can tell between the price of the individual pliers versus the price of the set.  For a wine accessory, the pliers look great!  There is a nice heft to them.However, despite the set focus being on the pliers, do not understate the sealer!  I love the sealer, and it is the item from the set that I use that much more regularly.  Terrific to lock in the great flavor, at least for a day.  Just be careful upon releasing the sealer as there is a lot of pressure that builds up in the bottle, and that sealer is NOT as gentle as a cork.  Follow the directions to the letter and be careful when opening.Recommended product.  Thanks Metrokane.  I'm enjoying this product in my home!

The Swingline High Heel Stapler with 20 Sheet Capacity brings a bit of personality to your office desk.  The product is sure to make an interesting gift for those who want a stapler just a bit out of the ordinary.  It is offered at an affordable price too.Besides the design, one key feature is that the stapler is always upright.  This makes it easy to grab and staple your documents while taking up a minimal amount of desk space.  A traditional stapler is long, lays flat and takes up more of a footprint, no pun intended, on the desk.  This stapler, just grab, staple, and you're good to go.  There are no awkward moments trying to align your sheets of paper just right as in the traditional horizontal staplers either.  Grab the shoe in hand, and align it right where you want it on your documents.  It truly is easy and fast. It's light, so it all is very easy to accomplish.Downsides?  The stapler does come in at a very attractive price, and the quality, while it has performed admirably thus far in our home, feels somewhat cheap. It feels like a just north of ten dollar stapler.  Still, if your stapling quantity is low to average, you might just to add the style and ease of use of the Swingline High Heel Stapler at your desk!

TheraBreath Plus Professional Formula Fresh Breath Toothpaste has a lot going for it on paper.  I love that it is vegan, cruelty free, and that it includes awesome ingredients like Xylitol, while also packing fluoride to prevent tooth decay.The toothpaste delivered its breath freshening promise.  After just a couple applications, I found my breath was that much fresher and stayed fresher, longer.The downside?  I did not enjoy the product as a regular toothpaste replacement.  The product is very viscous, with very little obvious polishing effect.  I felt as though I was brushing with water, the mixture wanting to run out of my mouth much more easily than a traditional toothpaste.  It felt messy and difficult to use.  Furthermore, my teeth were left feeling as though they weren't brushed very well.  I felt nearly like I had used a world class mouthwash, but still needed to brush my teeth.  I did not like that.Needless to say, after a couple uses, I have not wanted to use the product again.  It has some terrific ingredients and does seem to keep your breath fresh, longer.  Nevertheless, I want a toothpaste that leaves my teeth feeling clean and has some polishing action.  Perhaps, over time, I could implement it a few times a week, before a traditional toothpaste brushing.  However, it all seems like a bit too much work if, like me, you don't find the product can replace your regular toothpaste.

Scotts Turf Builder Zoysia Grass Seed is a great product in intense southern climates. While this seed, unlike other Scotts products does not come with the seeds coated in a water retaining coating, it does have the best formula of nutrients and seed to get you on the way to a nice lawn in the right climate.Many experiment with Zoysia in other climates such as Los Angeles with some success, a major complaint from most growers of Zoysia is in certain climates, its tendency to turn quite yellow in the winter.  This dormant appearance may or may not be a deal breaker for you.My climate is not the best for Zoysia, and it is slow to come up.  It's a beautiful grass in the right climate, and a great all around product from Scotts.  Scotts goal is to put everything you need in the bag.  It's the no brain method to grow some grass. Recommended product in the right climate.  Thanks Scotts!

Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Tall Fescue is a great product in a mild climate, not too warm, not too cool.  I love that the seeds are encapsulated in the special coating that retains water.  After all, we are encouraged to use less and less water by our governments due to legitimate environmental reasons and fresh seed needs a lot of water, this coating helps you control water use while still getting the fresh seed to sprout.My climate is not the best for Tall Fescue, but it still came up quickly. It won't make it through the summer, but I'm certainly enjoying it now.  It's a beautiful grass, and a great all around product from Scotts.  Scotts goal is to put everything you need in the bag.  Mulch, coated seed, any needed fertilizer, etc.  It's the no brain method to grow some grass, though this is best for a patch as it would get extremely costly for an entire yard, even in the larger quantities.  Recommended product in the right climate.  Thanks Scotts!

Aether Cone - The Thinking Music Player puts a twist on listening to music. It combines a never seen form factor, unique interface, internet music subscription option, and good sound.First, the design of the Aether Cone is what draws many in at first.  It arrives in a brown, clamshell box with a simple, easy to slide off cover.  The entire unboxing experience reminds you of an Apple product of ten years ago.  Special.Once you unwrap the cone from its drawstring bag, you will be impressed by the small size and quality finish of the product.  The black plastic is high quality, while the copper cap is unique.  The cone shape makes sense.  The cone stands easily. The cone shape and copper allude subtly to a Zonophone of a century ago, while packing the latest technology inside.  If you want an unique look, but not distracting or out of place, the highly advertised copper black is perfect.  For the ultimate, "match all my Apple products look," the silver and white would be a fine choice too.The interface is very unique on the Aether cone.  You setup the cone over Wi-Fi. I tried with my mobile browser, and the setup failed.  I tried via FireFox on my Mac, and it worked.Once you're running with an Aether Account and your cone is connected to Wi-Fi, you have access to free Rdio radio stations with commercials.  I honestly did not hear very much music I knew or enjoyed in the 30 minutes I played with the device on free radio.  Therefore, I upgraded to Rdio premium from Aether's website.  This included a one month free trial before the $10.00 monthly billing begins.Once on premium, I can say after the push of a button "Play songs by Artist..."  Or "play the album.....by ......."  It works great.  In those two scenarios it will continue to play the album and or artist.  However, not every artist is understood by the voice recognition. For example, "play songs by artist Norah Jones," did not play Norah Jones to the others members of my household's disappointment.  If you say just a song name, the Cone will hopefully find that song, and then play similar songs.  Very main strain and Hit 100 songs have much more sensible songs played after them than the less common genres.To make the requests I mentioned above, simply place your finger in the middle of the cone's front button, it's a sensor not a physical button, wait for the tone to chime, and speak the request.  Selections may also be made from the Aether application which is only available for iOS at this time.  The other buttons on the device are a volume up and down in copper finish (silver on the white Cone), power switch in the back, and the outer ring that allows you to cycle through an album or similar songs with a small turn of the ring, or change to a different artist or genre with a large turn of the ring.The functionality and interface is good.  It could be better, but its different and fun.  One of the largest complaints is that Rdio is the only source right now.  I would like to see SiriusXM stations added as well as Amazon Music, Beats Music, etc.  Still, Rdio is a good source for content on the premium subscription, the problem is if it is not already something you subscribe to, it creates an additional expense on a $400 device.  In three years, you will nearly double the cost of the speaker by subscribing to Rdio Premium. Perhaps, at $400, a year of Rdio premium could be included?If you have an iOS device, you can Airplay content to the speaker, but this adds a step that I do not like.  I prefer to simply request and pull up songs directly on the speaker from Rdio.Finally, the sound quality is very good.  This speaker is not huge.  While you can carefully hold it in one hand, it fills two entire palms.  Considering this smallish size, the sound quality is very good.  At the right distance and angle from the cone, some songs are simply terrific. Vocals and bass are particularly good for the size.  Still, this won't serve more than a room and there is no audio output to feed the sound to another speaker or audio system.One of the great features is the built-in battery.  There is no reason to keep the speaker tied to one location in your home.  Firstly, the size makes it possible to move from room to room, while the built in battery provides up to 8 hours of wireless operation.  Considering the volume level I have used the speaker, the battery performance has surprised me.  It works great.Overall, Aether Cone The Thinking Music Player is unique and a lot of fun.  I opened the Cone on Christmas Day and despite the slight initial connectivity hiccups and fairly regular voice recognition failure, it was a very fun item to use and learn about today.  I plan to keep my Cone for a long time, lets just hope some more audio choices are added to ease the dependability on Rdio premium, a good service, just expensive when you already pay for other music services.  The Cone team made a great functioning, oh so unique and special design, and good sounding speaker.  There is not anything like it out there.  The value for each user is different, many will find the device expensive, it's not a impulse purchase, but it is unique and if you have a use case in your home or office, there is little reason not to consider this very carefully engineered and special Aether Cone.  Hopefully, Aether will keep making it better!  Recommended product!

This STIGA Pro Carbon Table Tennis Racket is a professional racket which puts focus on speed and spin, with moderate control in your hand.  When you step up to this racket for your table tennis playing, the sport is important to you, and you mean business!One of the important things to me is the "feel," of the racket, and I like it!  It gives you confidence, the craftsmanship and finish ensured a great, comfortable grip.The speed and spin attributes are there as advertised, and the racket has more control than you might expect for a racket focused on the former attributes.If you do not mind giving up a little control, this is one of STIGA's highest end products.  Recommended, if you are serious enough to be considering this product.

Metrokane has long offered solid performing wine accessories.  The Metrokane 4043 Rabbit Wing Corkscrew carries on that reliable heritage.I have used Metrokane's original Rabbit Corkscrew for years now.  That product has an unusual design that makes opening a bottle of wine as simple as a push and pull of a lever.  It is 100 percent full proof.With the introduction of the 4043 winged product, Metrokrane has a corkscrew that is less than half of the price of their most revered product.  While it is not quite as easy as the more premium product, I like it.Firstly, like the traditional Rabbit corkscrew, the 4043 uses gears to take out some of the work for you.  After you screw the spiral into the cork with the large easy to grasp handle, you push down on the levers.  These levers take your energy and simplifies the process of nearly full-proofing the removal of the cork from the bottle.  Therefore, the product works great.Secondly, there is one edge I give to this entry level corkscrew.  The traditional Rabbit corkscrew can look bulky, large, and untraditional.  It works great, but in front of fellow wine aficionados, there is sometimes something about a traditional corkscrew that feels more right  While this 4043 product is more advanced than a traditional corkscrew, its look and feel is closer to what one expect's of a corkscrew, you still get to screw the spiral into the cork, which you do not get to do on the original and more expensive Rabbit.The only downside is that this product is slightly slower and cumbersome compared to the more premium product, and it is not as quick to eject the cork from the spiral after removing it from the bottle.Overall, Metrokane realizes that several corkscrews helps them offer a product for all price points and wine aficionado status.  This is a recommend product as it will make removing corks simple, while still giving you some traditional corkscrew touches.  It is not, however, as revolutionary and wow-factor as the original Metrokane Rabbit Corkscrew.

My True Nature Daisy's 2 in 1 Shampoo brings a light hearted attitude, gentle, vegan ingredients to your shower.My True Nature takes on a role that makes it a suitable natural shampoo for children or adults. The characters on the packages are fun.  Furthermore, this Shampoo / Body Wash comes with a strip of stickers sporting the company's characters.The scent is a delicate citrus that most should find pleasing.  It is not overpowering.  Certainly, adults enjoyed the product in our household.  The vegan ingredients are not only earth friendly, but treated adult hair well.  The product clearly cleans while at the same time being gentle and somewhat nourishing.One drawback is the very watery consistency of the product, but this may in part be down to the ingredients, so it is a balance.Overall, both children and adults will likely enjoy this product.  The only downsides could be the price for the bottle size, and the fact that it doesn't scream luxury when you use it.  Those in our household declared it "a good cleaning shampoo that is gentle."  None felt it carried the luxurious feel that a high end hair care product might sometimes possess.  Overall, recommended product.

TCP RLA1550ND LED A21 100 Watt Equivalent light bulb is a solid product for your serious lighting needs.  It may look similar to a traditional light bulb, but this is actually a high tech piece of kit.The bulb comes to your door ready to install in any traditional bulb socket you need this level of light output.  Simply open the box, unscrew your old bulb, and screw in the new one.The savings over a traditional bulb is significant, while the savings over a CFL is much more limited. Still, the LED bulbs last longer than CFL, so that takes some headaches out of home lighting maintenance.  You will not save a lot of electricity if you are upgrading from a CFL, but if you already need a new bulb, you might as well choose a terrific LED product like this one, particularly in sockets that are used on a daily basis where the savings add up quicker.I installed the product in a socket that is on nearly five hours per day.  Therefore, I feel good that I am using a 15-watt LED bulb during those hours.I have one or two other LED bulbs in my home, while most others are CFL.  As the CFLs die out, I will move towards LED, because again, the light output is terrific, the longevity is superb, and it's the greenest bulb out there by far.Please note that this bulb is Non-Dimmable, so do not buy expecting that feature.  It might sound odd, but this bulb was really fun to install in my home.  It was the highest output LED bulb I have tried to date.  Recommended product.

Dixie's Disposable Cutting Boards are a great idea for connivence and sanitary reasons.Firstly, on a few occasions when being lazy, I have been known to use three or four paper plates, if I have them in my house, to use for cutting.  The problem is, besides being wasteful, they are too small.  Dixie caught on to consumers desire to use a disposable cutting surface and introduced these cutting boards.Effectively, they are simply a very large paper plate.  I have found only two drawbacks.  First, the surface is somewhat slippery.  Therefore, I have found several pieces of fruits and vegetables slide and fly across the room when cutting.  It is simply a nature of the surface, not a significant issue.Secondly, it would be great if the cutting boards came in a reasonable bag.  I carefully opened the edge of the bag, but if you want to keep your cutting boards sealed to keep dust and other contaminants away until the next use, there really isn't a way to do that.Overall, Dixie saw a market for a product that people were already improvising in a less efficient way.  This is a good product.  I do wish I could reseal them though.  Thanks for introducing this product!

Canon's MAXIFY MB2320 Wireless Home Office Inkjet Printer is representing a sweet spot in Canon's new office and home office line.MAXIFY aims not at students nor your average home user.  All MAXIFY products aim at business users, no matter if you have a sizable office, cozy office, or home office.  There are also home users who demand the refinement and reliability of an office-capable machine.  MAXIFY offers several models in the lineup that hit different price points.This MB2320 is the top of the home office segment (there are three machines in the full office segment positioned above).You should make no mistake about the capabilities and power of the MB2320.  A multifunction unit at this price point has likely never offered the speed, quality, features, and shear duty cycle previously.  Indeed, I have not been this excited to setup and use a printer in a very long time.  It is an impressive unit.The machine is not small.  It is larger than home/consumer all in ones, no question, but not so much larger to be a bother.  The lines and the aesthetics are pleasant to look at, so I do not mind placing the machine in my home office.  It may not have the looks of a new MacBook Pro, but as a printer, it looks good.  The plastics on the device, while hard, have a texture and weight a step higher than you typically see at this price point.  Craftsmanship is therefore better than expected.The speed of the unit impresses me, especially "Quick First Print."  I print from a different room than the printer.  With my previous units, I could walk into the other room, and I would still be waiting on the printing to begin.  With the MB2320, I walk into the other room and I have not one page printed, but my entire three page document.  The speed blows me away at this price point.  Plus, double sided printing isn't much slower and I have yet to have it hang up. This machine simply works.As I use the MB2330 with Macs, the printer driver worked automatically out of the box.  AirPrint works seamlessly from my iPhone and iPad too when connected to the same network as the printer, double sided printing works from the iOS devices too.The two paper trays are terrific.  Keep envelopes in one, always ready, or photo paper, or letterhead, the options are endless.  I keep the second tray filled with 200 sheets of standard paper, and I never have to remove it, as I can use tray 1 for any specialities I might need as listed above.Print quality?  The black is terrific.  For an inkjet printer, the text documents I have printed, all on "standard," setting with plain paper, look as good as I have ever seen inkjet.  You will not be disappointed with the text quality.  I printed a quick photograph.  It's acceptable, a photo enthusiast will always choose a photo printer with several more ink colors.  The ink in a business machine is designed for text documents first.The printer supports OneDrive, DropBox, and Google Drive out of the box.One of the most impressive aspects of the machine is its shear personality.  It is a serious printing machine.  There is not much you ask it to do that is going to disappoint you.  I am not dealing with jams, odd errors, nor any other issues.  The printer works, and it's 15,000 pages per month duty cycle means in a 20 day work month, your office could print 750 pages a day and be within the limits of the machine.  Canon also touts its US based support that comes with all Maxify printers, but I have not needed support.Overall, Canon has delivered a very high end home office printing solution.  Serious printing can be accomplished on this machine, and I believe many workplace offices would do quite well with one or two of these units too.  It should not be limited exclusively to home offices despite its positioning in the MAXIFY lineup.  My only question?  Canon states it is bringing down printing costs on these business units as they are likely to be used for a higher quantity of printing.  The XL cartridges do look to have a large capacity.  Furthermore, Canon includes Standard cartridges with the printer, rather than "Trial" size.  These standard units are not nearly as good as XL, but it won't run out after 25 pages either as a trial cartridge will.  Still, $70-$75 for a complete set of ink, color and black in XL size, is expensive, nearly half the unit price.  I am not certain how many users want to spend that on ink if printing high demand office needs.  Still, the product works so well, if the cartridges come down just a bit, I can't see giving up the MAXIFY MB2320.  Recommended Product!

Roxio's Toast Titanium 12 for Mac is the latest release in the series of disc authoring programs.  I have been using Toast since version 7.  The product originally intended to simplify disc authoring.  It is still great at this.  From a myriad of video formats, Toast will allow you to burn the disc in many ways.  Perhaps, you want the data written to the disc untouched, no problem.  Perhaps, you want the video files you drag into Toast converted to a DVD format to play on any DVD player, no problem. Toast will convert it, and then burn a DVD video disc.With each addition Toast aims to add  more features.  What's the latest features?  Social media components continue to be added.  Upload content right to Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, and Twitter.  Plus, there is a great new screen caption feature, to capture video straight from your screen.  The possibilities are endless for creating videos and presentations whether for work, school, or play.Plus, with traditional media, i.e. discs becoming ever less popular, the product is now marketed as "The ultimate digital media toolkit."  Toast will convert your video files, perhaps from your digital camcorder as an example, to formats to play back easily on your iPad, iPhone, or Apple TV.Essentially, when you are going to be working with media on your computer, needing to author a disc, share media content, copy your home video file, or do conversion of the content, Toast wants to be what you turn to first.It's a capable product.  It simplifies many of these tasks, while some are slightly less polished.  The argument others may make is that you can do many of the things that toast offers with free utilities and built in OS X features.  However, Toast brings it all together in Toast 12 Titanium.  You may just find it is easier to get what you need done, without the need to go searching for other software by turning once again to Toast.  I know I continue to enjoy the product.

Kobi Electric 10-watt (60 watt equivalent) Omni Directional LED light bulb is a terrific product.  It may look similar to a traditional light bulb, but this is actually a high tech piece of kit.The bulb comes to your door ready to install in any traditional bulb socket.  Simply open the box, unscrew your old bulb, and screw in the new one.The savings over a traditional bulb is significant, while the savings over a CFL is minimal.  Nevertheless, the LED bulbs last even longer than CFL, so that takes some headaches out of home lighting maintenance.  You won't save a lot of electricity if you're upgrading from a CFL, but if you already need a new bulb, you might as well choose a terrific LED product like this one, particularly in sockets that are used on a daily basis.I actually installed the bulb in a socket that I must run 24 hours  day.  Therefore, I feel good that I am using a 10-watt LED bulb.I have one or two other LED bulbs in my home, while most others are CFL.  As the CFLs die out, I will move towards LED, because again, the light output is terrific, the longevity is superb, and it's the greenest bulb out there by far.Kobi touts the ability to dim the bulb compared to CFL, and I tested this feature.  Yet another way we can get greener now, since most dimming situations can now use an energy efficient bulb.  It might sound odd, but this bulb was really fun to receive and install in my home.  Recommended product.

ACDelco's 94R AGM battery features equal performance of batteries you will find at the local auto parts stores.  I purchased this battery to install in family's Mercedes-Benz C Class.  That vehicle uses a 94R size battery, therefore, this battery fit perfect.  The original battery was not AGM, but the AGM technology allowed the battery to be shipped to my door, and I love that convenience.  Furthermore, with the recent Amazon coupon, the battery was nearly half of the cost of the AGM battery at local parts stores, and it was nearly as much cheaper than the non-AGM batteries.Only time will tell how long the battery will last.  The venting hole, case, etc. all fit perfectly in the vehicle.  A perfect fit, it starts the vehicle up beautifully, and it shows strong voltage.The battery was manufactured only two months prior to delivery, so it is nice and fresh.I compared all the 94R AGM batteries that the parts stores sell online, and they all have identical specs, therefore I came to the conclusion that the 94R AGM must be manufactured by the same company in the USA and sold under the various brands. Now, there are differences at the parts store in non-AGM 94R batteries, but the AGM varieties all appeared to be the same in this size as of this writing.The 94R battery size is used in various vehicles from Mercedes-Benz to Camaro.  The AGM technology is more stable when subjected to vibration.  This feature may not be needed in your road car.  Some vehicles require AGM batteries, when the battery is installed in the cabin, for example, under a seat.  Upgrading from a standard flooded battery to AGM is not necessary, in some cases, it may not last as long as heat can be detremental to AGM in a hot engine bay.  Nevertheless, in the Mercedes-Benz model I installed the product, the battery compartment, while in the engine bay, is somewhat isolated, protected by aluminum and receives some air from the cabin's ventilation system that circulates just above the battery.Overall, while this AC Delco 94R AGM battery appears equal to the 94R AGM batteries you may find at the local parts stores, the price blew me away at Amazon with recent coupon.  I have my fingers crossed the battery will last through the warranty period as I truly have no idea how you would utilize the warranty if you do not have AC Delco battery retailer near you. Amazon will likely not want to take the battery back after 30 days.  This should be clarified in the product information.I would recommend the battery for applications requiring a 94R AGM battery.  Furthermore, if you don't mind switching to AGM technology, which has both pros and cons (a big pro being that it is shippable to your door), the battery can work in other 94R application as well.  I am happy with my purchase due to the convenience and price. Thanks for offering this battery!

Pennzoil Ultra is the company's top of the line motor oil.  Shell, parent company of Pennzoil, engineered this 5w-40 European Full Synthetic product to meet the tough European Specifications.  Indeed, you would be hard pressed to find a common late model gasoline European vehicle that is not covered by this product (always double check though).Its approvals include Mercedes-Benz 229.5, BMW LL-01, Porsche A40, Ferrari, Maserati, Fiat, VW 505.00, and VW 502.00.These specifications all speak to the quality of the product. In particular, Mercedes-Benz 229.5 (used in the majority of gasoline engine Mercedes cars the past decade) is particularly tough to meet.In normal operating conditions, when you have a European vehicle, an approved oil allows you to comfortably run the full oil change interval recommended by your manufacturer.  Some of these European manufacturers have very long oil change intervals, which is why the correct oil with a strong additive package is so very important.Due to licensing, very few products meet current Ferrari specifications in North America.  This is about your only choice if you have a Ferrari in North America (you must be very happy if you have that Ferrari), and that specification sets this product apart from its rival European products from Mobil and Castrol which do not meet Ferrari spec.  The technical specs are all impressive.  This product has a very low NOACK volatility and proper viscosity for the majority of European vehicles in most climates.This is a highly recommended product. Depending on price and your personal preferences, Mobil 1 0w-40 is another terrific option that meets most of the same specifications besides Ferrari, Maserati, and Fiat.

Castrol EDGE 0w-30 SPT Synthetic Motor Oil has been loved and raved about by European car owners for a decade now.  It is one of Castrol's premier products in that it meets so many tough European specifications including Mercedes-Benz 229.5, BMW LL-01, VW 505.00, and VW 502.00.These specifications all speak to the quality of the product. In particular, Mercedes-Benz 229.5 (used in the majority of gasoline engine Mercedes cars the past decade) is particularly tough to meet.The product has often been referred to as German Castrol because for many years it was produced in Germany.  Now, you may still find it made in Germany, but some cases are showing up from Belgium.  Rest assured, it is still the high quality product meeting the tough European specifications no matter where it is produced.The low pour point of this product, approximately -50 Degree Centigrade suggests it has a significant percentage of Group IV Synthetic base stock in its formulation. Group III base stock is also high quality today, but the fact remains that Castrol is putting very high quality ingredients into this premier product. Of course, the oil companies today never tell us the exact formulation, so we can only take best guesses. Nevertheless, it is clear that it is a high quality product no matter what base stock is used because it does officially meet the tough European specifications listed on the bottle.When you have a European vehicle and you use a motor oil that meets the manufacturer specifications, you can feel comfortable going to the full maintenance interval recommended by your manufacturer under normal conditions.This is a highly recommended product. Depending on price and your personal preferences, Mobil 1 0w-40 is another terrific option that meets the same specifications as well as a few additional ones.Note - This product seems similar to Castrol's new 0w-40 product.  One difference though is that Porsche requires a 40 weight, so the 0w-40 product meets Porsche specification while this 0w-30 product does not.

Castrol introduced EDGE 0w-40 SPT Synthetic Motor Oil to the United States market during 2013.  It is one of Castrol's flagship products in that it meets so many tough European specifications including Mercedes-Benz 229.5, BMW LL-01, Porsche A40, VW 505.00, and VW 502.00.These specifications all speak to the quality of the product.  In particular, Mercedes-Benz 229.5 (used in the majority of gasoline engine Mercedes cars the past decade) is particularly tough to meet.The product was initially Made in Belgium for the U.S. market, but in early 2014 some cases are coming from Germany.  The low pour point of this product, approximately -50 Degree Centigrade suggests it has a significant percentage of Group IV Synthetic base stock in its formulation.  Group III base stock is also high quality today, but the fact remains that Castrol is putting very high quality ingredients into this premier product.  Of course, the oil companies today never tell us the exact formulation, so we can only take best guesses.  Nevertheless, it is clear that it is a high quality product no matter what base stock is used because it does officially meet the tough European specifications listed on the bottle.When you have a European vehicle and you use a motor oil that meets the manufacturer specifications, you can feel comfortable going to the full maintenance interval recommended by your manufacturer under normal conditions.This is a highly recommended product.  Depending on price and your personal preferences, Mobil 1 0w-40 is another terrific option that meets the same specifications as well as a few additional ones.Note - This product seems similar to Castrol's 0w-30 offering which has been loved by European car lovers for years.  One difference though is that Porsche requires a 40 weight, so this 0w-40 product meets Porsche specification while the 0w-30 product does not.

Firstly, EZ Lawn and Garden Leaf stomper is a pretty cool idea.  It is an unique item and would make a great extra gift for the holidays or a birthday.  You easily install it on a rake or other gardening tool's handle.  I even had a spare handle with no rake, so I do not always have to deal with the big orange foot near my shoulder while raking.The stomper effectively helps compact leaves, which saves you space and bags!  Some reviewers mentioned it's not great for plastic bags as you will go through the bag.  This is indeed very possible.  However, if the bag is large enough, I have still had some success using it.  Sure, ideally, it will work much better in large paper bags.Secondly, it depends on the type of debris you are trying to compact with the stomper in terms of the effectiveness. Some leaves and lawn debris simply compact better than others.  My leaves don't necessarily compact too much, but it's still useful.Overall, it's a very cool idea.  I'm glad it is on the market, and I am glad I own it.  I'm sure there are more uses for it too.  I know some people have mentioned compacting other forms of trash.  Neat item, sure it's not quite as effective as you would ideally want, but I would still recommend giving it a try!

Remington's XR1370 Hyper Series Rotary Shaver offers a high, feel good in the hand build quality and styling at at mid-range price point.  Indeed, it seems Remington tries to put more features/style into products at each respective price points in an attempt to tackle the sales leader in the industry, Philips Norelco.They have delivered again.  You get lithium battery technology.  This is welcomed as you will find over the life of the shaver, the battery's runtime will remain more consistent than older battery technologies.  Plus, a quick 5 minute charge will provide enough power for a single shave.  Perfect in the moments you find your shaver's battery dead.Next, you will have fewer of those moments when you run out of charge as there is a digital runtime display.  Right on the front of the shaver, it displays the minutes remaining until the next charge.  You can plan ahead before you reach 0!The build quality is quite nice indeed for a Wet and Dry shaver.  There are chrome accents for style, but soft rubber grips, which feel good in the hand and prevents any slip in the wet.Finally, the stand is oh so clever.  While it holds the shaver upright on your a flat service, it also prevents the shaver from being accidentally switched on, if packed in a suitcase. Clever!The shave is quite acceptable for a rotary shaver in this category.  It is about what you would expect.  Not perfect, but very good.  The head design simply does not have that perfect, natural, feel to it, but overtime, it seems more natural.Overall, Remington packed in a lot of features and style at a good price.  Plus, the shave is ok too!  Recommended.

This Epson C11CD31201 Expression Premium XP-610 Wireless Printer, Scanner, and Copier delivers basic home printing needs.It gives you the versatility on placement as the unit is very compact.  One downside to that is the paper feeder.  I never love upright paper trays.  The paper gets dusty and takes up vertical space, but again it keeps the printer footprint down in size.  I always feel somewhat silly recommending units that do not have fax capability because if you're already putting the money down, fax capability is just a little bit more.This unit completely lacks fax functionality.  However, as a second printer, or perhaps you already have a fax machine, the machine could still work for you nicely.The quality of text printing for business documents is high quality. Indeed, this printer makes business document printing its priority with its sharp, crisp text. Pictures look nice, but not as nice as a dedicated photo printer (which are often more expensive and use additional color cartridges that you must buy in addition to the standard colors.You do get Apple AirPrint functionality to print right from your iPhone or iPad, when connected to the same Wi-Fi network as the printer. Setup is also easy in Mac OS X.  OS X gets all the necessary drivers, no extensive installation process is necessary.  It's also important to note that as machines push more towards wireless as the default, a USB cable is NOT included, but I truly have no need for one, nor will most users with Wi-Fi.Overall, if you need a a small scanner, printer, and copier this XP-610 may work for you. The price point is about right, though you could spend a bit more and get fax functionality too.  There are some decent values on ink if you search carefully on Amazon. though older printer models ink have slightly better availability. Overall, good performance and a good product.

This Epson C11CD2901 Expression Premium XP-810 Wireless Printer, Scanner, Copier, and Fax delivers nearly all you could want.It gives you the versatility of using the unit as your small office powerhouse or a random home photograph or two.  I always feel somewhat silly recommending units that do not have fax capability because if you're already putting the money down, fax capability is just a little bit more.  You might only use it a handful times each year, but it's oh so convenient to have a perfect working fax machine when you NEED it.The fax functionality on this unit works great.You will be grateful when you need to fax that form in, or get something faxed to you.  Honestly, it's hard for me to consider a machine without fax capability.What this machine also delivers is a great scanner.  The scan resolution and quality is higher than many all in one units. Indeed, it offers up to 4800x4800 DPI scanning.  Many AIOs I have tried featured only 2400dpi scanning.The quality of text printing for business documents is very high quality.  Indeed, this printer makes business document printing its priority with its sharp, crisp text.  Pictures look nice, but not as nice as a dedicated photo printer (which are often more expensive, use more color cartridges and almost always lack fax functionality).Don't forget, you do get Apple Air Print functionality to print right from your iPhone or iPad, when connected to the same Wi-Fi network as the printer.  It's also important to note that as machines push more towards wireless as the default, a USB cable is NOT included, but I truly have no need for one, nor will most users with Wi-Fi.Overall, if you need a home office or small office scanner, printer, copier, and fax, I certainly do recommend the XP-810.  The price point is a bit higher than you might expect, but the extra features MAY be worth it to you.  There are some decent values on ink if you search carefully on Amazon. though other printer models ink have slightly better availability.  Overall, good performance and a good product. Recommended.

This Westcott iPoint Curve Axis Electric Pencil Sharpener has taken a stylish approach when creating this easonably priced unit.  Truly, it is named "iPoint," a slight reference to the many "i" products available today.  The design is attractive on your modern desk next to the latest tablet or notebook computer.True, the materials aren't of the highest quality, but the design is still ahead of the bland office pencil sharpener you likely have in your office now.  That is exactly where I put it to use, in a moderately heavy environment.  It didn't disappointment necessarily.  The point left on your pencil after sharpening is appropriate and enjoyable to write with.  The motor sounds of quality and thus far, it has held up fine.  The slightly clumsy shavings cubicle has spilled on me a twice while attempting to empty it, and it's not particularly large.  It does fill up faster than you wish it would.Nevertheless, at a decent price, why not keep your desk stylish and modern?  The latest offering from Westcott allows you to keep your pencil sharp and your office ascetics sharp too, at a reasonable price.  Recommended.

It was fun to see the eyes light up in our household by the sewing and crafting hobbyist.  Truly, this SINGER One Plus 221-stitch computerized sewing machine with LCD screen gets one into the geek category of the crafting world.The machine sounds quiet and confident, it's made to do its thing.  Be sure to read the directions before threading the for the first time, with or without the automatic threader attached, be sure to read the directions for both methods.What does the LCD display show you?  It displays the type of stitch you selected, which is quite handy, but the input to change the switch is made via a knob.The machine is somewhat bigger than the old discount machine that might be in the back closet, so prepare to have the space required.  Overall, for those who love their sew crafting, what a machine.  Truly, these machines are used to create so many precious, personal gifts for little ones, etc. Those will become memories over the years too!  It's great to know that with new technology, there is still same great at home crafting in the country and the technology in this machine simply serves to aid and make things go that much smoother.  Recommended machine if your home has a serious crafter.

It is that never ending battle in our lives today: keeping those tech devices charged.  Smartphones, iPhones, iPods, iPads, cameras, etc. Where does it end?  It seems almost everything needs a charge these days.Furthermore, should you overuse your device or forget a charge at home, there is nothing quite as frustrating as heading out whether for work, travel, or play to find that your battery is low.  You don't want to be without your favorite tunes for the drive home, or without your phone's camera during that once in a decade road trip!  Tylt offers this dual USB port charging device to solve all these frustrations.I love it!  First, simplicity, plug it into your car's 12V power outlet and you instantly gain two USB ports, spaced appropriately away from each other.  With USB, simply plug the USB end of the cable that came with your device to the Tylt, and then the propriety end into your unit.  I like that.  No need to necessarily buy extra cables, since this simply gives you two USB ports.Furthermore, Tylt takes car USB charging to another level because you will no longer have to fight with your wife, children, or colleague for the use of the USB port in your car.  This gives you two!  One for you, and one for them!  What's not to like? I'm enjoying this product!  Recommended.

I was very excited to get started packing my new Targus Pewter backpack for 16 inch notebook computers.  I have always found Targus products to be of high quality, and this is far from an exception.  Indeed, it's more than I expected.Firstly, the computer storage is there, it seems protective enough, though some will always find tucking your machine in a sleeve first to provide that bit extra care.  Next, even with the computer inserted, you still have room and pocket for an iPad or iPad-sized tablet device.  Perfect, if you need to take it all with you, you can with this backpack.  It doesn't end there, feel free to pack all the headphones, A/C adapters, or other little accessories you might need, you won't run out of room too fast.The shoulder straps are oh so comfortable, and the entire backpack is of very high quality and construction.  One weekend, I left the electronics at home, and actually packed some clothes.  It was not ideal, but I love the backpack that much, I use it for anything.Recommended product!  You will find many uses for this, but as a notebook and/or tablet backpack, it's hard to go wrong with this one.

The Bank Heavy Duty Upright is a beast.  It is not the most gorgeous, but it's sturdy, solid, and capable, which makes it admirable.  Truly, a vacuum intended for commercial use, you might just find it lasts for decades.Firstly, a rather short assembly is required for the vacuum.  Sadly, my magnets arrived crumbling and not in place, so I have no idea exactly where they go or how I would even install them at this point, since most of them are in pieces.  The Bank company could package the vacuum with more protection in its box.Otherwise, once put together, the Vacuum is simple and oh so capable.  The trick is to have The Bank Heavy Duty on the highest level setting and lower it, one setting at a time, until you hear the unit begin to hum.  You then have the ideal setting for your carpet.Despite its beastly size and appearance, it's not too difficult to maneuver.  The performance?  I have been vacuuming nightly, and my carpet looks great.  Now, I would not say it is any better than my Dyson unit, but about as good with the durability of a commercial unit.  Truly, if you are a hotel, large business, etc. you need a vacuum that can be used all day, for years.  This would be the machine for such an application.  In the home, there are consumer products that are cooler looking, contain nifty features, and do an equally good job in performance.In terms of filtration, a HEPA bag is included.  A bag might seem like a step backwards, but it doesn't have to be thrown away very often compared to emptying a canister, so it saves you time.  This is a reason for commercial use too, a business cannot empty a canister every time they vacuum a room, with the bag they are good to go for a long time.  The air expelled from the HEPA bag and the material zipper bag seems clean indeed, so there should not be any concerns in this regard.The rubber bumper around the vacuum should make you feel confident that it will not damage furniture as long as the slightest care is still used.Overall, The Bank Heavy Duty is a New York State made commercial vacuuming machine!  You have to respect such a solid machine.  It could potentially last a commercial user many years and likely decades, you can only imagine how long it might last if you chose to use it in a home.  Nevertheless, for the price, you can spend less on a consumer product and get better looks and cool features.  Still, if you are a commercial property, pick a machine suited for the job, The Bank Heavy Duty might be just what you need!

Epson's C11CC87201 Expression Home XP-410 Wireless Printer, Scanner, and Copier might not be the printer with the most options on the market, but it does have some neat features at a great price.Firstly, the footprint is fantastic.  I have a tight space below my desk, there is a shelf but relatively small.  Nevertheless, the XP-410 fits there beautifully.  It's slightly complicated by the fact the printer has an upright paper feeder.  This looks somewhat cluttered and requires some available height above the printer.  Nevertheless, it is still a great option with the footprint.Secondly, the print quality is acceptable.  There are quite a few options for affordable Epson cartridges on the market.  It's your standard printer with black ink and three colors.Wireless functionality is fine.  With my Mac, both wireless printing and scanning was quick and easy.  Setup was automatic.The scanning feels somewhat slow compared to more pricey competitors.  I couldn't believe how long one black and white document copy took.  Therefore, if you plan to use this for serious office work, you might look at a more robust machine.  However, for a student or personal home printer and scanner, it will suffice.  It's an extra printer for me, so I have no complaints.  Recommended for the small footprint and price, but you can spend a little more and get more features and performance should you need it.

Braun's Cruzer 5 Hair Clipper is a neat item in that it aims to bring a handheld clipper with wireless convenience.  The item is comfortable and light to hold.  It's much smaller than a traditional plug in clipper as well.Performance?  In terms of trimming directly with the metal clipper, the performance seems solid.  It trims beautifully.However, should you add on the easily adjustable comb and attempt to actually cut hair, it's a more interesting situation.  The relative light weight and size of the clipper causes it to not quite grasp the hair.  Therefore, you end up making many more passes than you would with a traditional hard wired clipper.Overall, if you're mainly using this for direct trimming around tough to reach spaces, it's a neat product as it's wireless.  However, for more heavy duty hair cutting, you might look at a traditional product.

Scotch Printer Message Tape sounded like a superb idea to me.For those most fragile shipments, you could combine strong packaging tape and a message to remind anyone handling the package to be careful.  Well, the second part the tape accomplishes, the first part, not so much.The tape is simply not strong enough to use as your primary tape to seal those fragile boxes.  You will find you can easily lift up the flaps of the box with little effort, if this is the only tape you apply.  It simply is not strong enough.Nevertheless, the tape is quite expensive. Therefore, why would you want to use it as your primary tape?  My recommendation?  Simply secure your box or package with the tape you normally trust to seal it.  Then, should the package be particularly fragile, wrap a single strip of this across the top to alert handlers that it is fragile.  Solution and a cost saver!  Therefore, it's still a useful product. Thanks Scotch!

Ambient Weather's WR-334-U is a great emergency solar and hand crank weather radio, flashlight, siren, and smart phone charger.The product is unique as it is appealing to today's solar kick, but with the more reliable hand crank also available.  Truly, why be without a radio in an emergency?  You won't be with this option.  I love that.  Stash it where you know you can find it in your home, and you will be ready when you lose power or goodness forbid, an emergency/disaster.The radio functionality works great and a weather radio band is also included.  The product attempts to make you upgrade from an older model you might have because it also includes cell phone charging for some of the more popular models such as the iPhone dock connector (but not the newest lightning connector you will need to use your own adapter for those).Overall, it's hard to argue against such a product.  Best of all, for those hard to decide on gifts, why not choose such a product?  It's practical and could truly help your family or friends in an emergency. The only downside is that the item is so versatile you might just want to use it as a radio from time to time.  The downside?  The downside is the compact nature of the unit, great for true emergencies, makes the quality of the sound output not the very best, but it is still usable without question.  Recommended product.

TP-LINK's affordable TL-SG1016D is a terrific device for a prosumer or more likely, professional work environment.  With 16 ports and up to 32Gbps capacity, you do not have to worry about any slowdowns in your system or network.Truly, with the rack mountable nature of the switch, the ports, and the speed, it's hard not to jump on the price when you consider the much more costly options of just a few years ago.  Furthermore, with TP-LINK you have a brand you can trust in this market.  Nevertheless, should you desire even more flexibility for the most complex business environment, there are 19 inch, desktop sizes, and up to 48 port models available.Truly, take a minute to look through TP-Link's offering in this range.  It is complex and diverse from a five port offering up to these true powerhouse options.  You surely will find the perfect fit for your needs!

Remington's AQ7A Rotary Shaver is hard to criticize.  It offers a quality shaving product at a price much lower than the higher end shaving offerings, but has often demanded features.First, the expected wet functionality is here.  It can be used wet, but as most reviews suggest, you will find limited use for this functionality.Second, unique to a rotary shaver in this price range is an included docking station.  It seems simple, but it does help you keep it charged up, when you have an easy dock to drop it into.  Why fumble with hooking up the cable's plug each time, when you can just drop it in the cradle?
